data.name: Hoverboy - Medium Donation & Wallpaper
data.detailed_description: This DLC is meant as a form of donation to the developer. It does not include any in-game feature! As thanks, you will however get one wallpaper (png image), which will be added to the game files directory.
data.about_the_game: This DLC is meant as a form of donation to the developer. It does not include any in-game feature! As thanks, you will however get one wallpaper (png image), which will be added to the game files directory.
data.short_description: This DLC is meant as a form of donation to the developer. It does not include any in-game feature! As thanks, you will however get one wallpaper (png image), which will be added to the game files directory.
